title: Group Anagrams
description: Given an array of strings, group the anagrams together. You can return the answer in any order. An Anagram is a word or phrase formed by rearranging the letters of a different word or phrase, typically using all the original letters exactly once.
hints: Can you sort each string and use it as a key?
What data structure would help group strings with the same sorted form?
Alternative: Can you use character frequency counts as a key instead of sorting?
real_world_applications: Clustering similar log messages for analysis
